channel.title: mac on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in mac on Barefoot Rob

item.title: battery dead
item.description: 09:05 Monday 01 January 2018 JST The battery on my Mac is so dead that it cannot even remember the date. Today is actually April 12th, 2019, not Jan 1st, 2018. 14:09 Friday 12 April 2019 JST That’s more like it.

item.title: new battery and fans
item.description: 18:30 Monday 03 December 2018 JST Thanks to Lantz for replacing the battery and both fans in just 30 minutes at Loreatec. (30 minutes after waiting a week for parts to be shipped) Machine works and is back to being quiet. yay!

item.title: MBP to get new parts
item.description: 21:41 Monday 29 June 2015 JST I’m planning to take my computer to Apple on Wednesday; I don’t have an excellent replacement computer, but I’m hoping the old Dell will be enough. Unfortunately I can’t do Unity on the Dell. I’ll try to install Unity on my old MacBook.
